turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello assistant, I would like a small vanilla latte from Peet's pronto.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which Peet's would you like me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want you to get my latte from the Peet's on Blossom Hill next to the Whole Foods.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Why that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They make the best vanilla lattes in all of San Jose.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any add ons in you latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Heck no!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No way Jose!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Extra syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ugh disgusting!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cow milk!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Whole or skim?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole omg!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm just making sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well you ask too many questions!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think this is a hostile work environment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Deal with it! Where's my coffee?!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It;s available for pickup at the Peet's on Blossom Hill road in San Jose.
